description: Athletic hunk Dante Colle cannot wait to get home so he can finally get off with his cute, fit boyfriend Luke Hudson. Except Luke really isn’t in the mood, and dismisses of all Dante’s attempts to get freaky. Out of frustration, Dante jerks himself off in another room, but that does more bad than good since now he’s uncontrollably horny! Dante finds Luke eating at the kitchen table, and takes matters into his own hands pushing everything off, and grabbing a hold of Luke’s sweet ass right there!
title: He's Always Hard For Me
